title: I spend three months of the year at Kure Beach, the other nine up here in Nashville, TN, wishing I was down there.  To ease the pain, I check the Kure Beach Web  Cam daily and imagine I\'m there with the fisherfolk and pelicans perched on the pier.   But the shot of the pier has gone away!  Can you find out if and when it\'s coming back?
text:
I don't know why it isn't showing up on the pier website, but that
feed comes from SurfChex. It's working fine there:
http://www.surfchex.com/kure-beach-web-cam.php
